mapper.select: SELECT company.id as id_comIndex, company.company_name, recruitment.id as id_recruitIndex, recruitment.company_id, recruitment.title, recruitment.job, recruitment.salary FROM recruitment LEFT JOIN company ON recruitment.company_id = company.id;

SELECT company.id as id_comIndex, company.company_name, recruitment.id as id_recruitIndex, recruitment.company_id, recruitment.title, recruitment.start_date, recruitment.end_date, recruitment.salary, recruitment.location, recruitment.work_form, recruitment.job, recruitment.skills, recruitment.career FROM recruitment LEFT JOIN company ON recruitment.company_id = company.id where recruitment.id = #{id_recruitIndex};
